Museum Manager Pantheon:
Grave Robbers are raiding tombs and crypts all over the continent! Please, help us stop them!
The easterly door leads to the Golden Altar of the Isle of Souls.
The southerly door leads to Mimir's Altar of the Isle of Souls, but only heroes who have reached Lv. 110 can go there.
The westerly door leads to the Plunderous Plains, but only heroes who have reached Lv. 115 can go there.
The notherly door leads to the Elven Forest, but only heroes who have reached Lv. 120 can go there.
